intro: Numisaureum, commonly known as the golden groundsel, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive, daisy-like appearance.
